[ how to play ]

This game is played with one deck of cards (52 cards).
1 stock pile (3 cards faced down)
1 foundation pile (1 card faced up)
7 tableau piles (each contain 7 cards, first four piles three cards are faced down and four cards faced up. In other piles all cards are faced up )

Build down cards at 13 to 1 with same suit, this will remove these card at tableau. You can move any opened card or sequence of cards to another tableau pile, if card is same suit and one smaller than the top card of the that another pile.
Click on the stock to deal remaining cards to first three piles.
